entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Otherwise sunny. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 17 this morning. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Tuesday 18 April 2023
